txt_en: Nobody else gets to tell you what your story is.
Love is beautiful. Love is wonderful.
You need to take responsibility for your life.
txt_cn: 你应该对自己的人生负责。

txt_en: True wealth is measured in friendships.
Sometimes your whole life boils down to one insane move.
txt_cn: 人生的转机有时就得靠一次疯狂的举动。

txt_en: You're the one who can fill the world with sunshine.
txt_cn: 是你让世界每一处都充满了阳光。
